info.title: Api Inventario

post.summary: Register the information of a category

get.summary: Displays the information of a category

message.example: There is no category with the id entered, please enter another one

put.summary: Update the information of a category

message.example: There is no category with the id entered, please enter another one

delete.summary: Delete the information of a category

message.example: There is no category with the id entered, please enter another one

post.summary: Register the information of a product

get.summary: Displays the information of a product

message.example: There is no product with the id entered, please enter another one

post.summary: Update the information of a  product

delete.summary: Delete the information of a product

message.example: There is no product with the id entered, please enter another one

post.summary: Get a JWT via given credentials.

message.example: Registered successfully. Please check your email to verify your account.

post.summary: Log the user out (Invalidate the token).

get.summary: Check if the account is verified

202.description: Validation if the user is already verified

post.summary: Check if the account is verified

message.example: A new verification link has been emailed to you!
We were unable to find a user with that email address
This email address is already verified
The password reset email could not be sent.

post.summary: Recovery the password using a recovery token.
